FrageText.de: Welche Informationen muss ein Notruf enthalten?
FrageText.en: What pieces of information does an emergency call have to contain?
FrageText.hr: Koje informacije mora sadržavati interventni poziv?
FrageText.sl: Kater informacije mora vsebovati klic v sili?
FrageText.tr: Acil yardım çağrısında hangi bilgilerin bulunması gerekir?

en.Text: Where is the scene of accident?
How many persons have been injured?
